XMVP.Story: { "title": "Rehearsal Roulette", "synopsis": "Nathan Fielder, convinced a mundane road trip is a cosmic test, meticulously rehearses every conceivable outcome, leading to a hilariously chaotic spiral of increasingly absurd simulations and bewildered participants.", "characters": [ "Norm Nussbaum (as himself)", "The 'Yes' Crew", "Norm's Optimistic Outpost", "The 'Freedom Mobile'", "Bartholomew's Bovine & Beverage Emporium", "The Paved Paradox", "The 'Support Squad' Shuttle", "INT.
